content: **scrappy ski hat** is just a simple slouchy or beanie if you make it shallower i made to destash a little at the moment it s number one hat in my family it must be because of the huge pompom - enjoy *please bear in mind that the instructions you find when you follow the link are just my pattern notes which haven t been thoroughly tested and edited the instructions cover only size adult * --- polskie tłumaczenie moich notatek można znaleźć na blogu lete s knits pl 1 miłego dziergania 1 http //www letesknits pl/blog/2014/01/czapka-narciarka/
